# deleteAll()

**Instance Method**

Deletes all of the items from the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func deleteAll()
```

## Removing items

- **delete(_:)**: Deletes the items with the specified identifiers, and any of their child items, from the section snapshot.

items.description: Deletes the items with the specified identifiers, and any of their child items, from the section snapshot.
items.name: delete(_:)
